Sharing and copyrights

Everything on this site (that I'm not selling), is licenced under Creative Commons "BY". Basically this means... use anything here however you like (commercial or non-commercial), but credit my site. (A link would be nice.)

If you want to use something I'm selling (such as Grammar Plus audio) for non-personal use, please contact me and we can work something out. (I'm quite friendly.)

If you make something (paid or free) for the JLPT, let me know. If it's useful for learners, I want it on my site!
